name: AIM<
description:
Story

A futuristic mech, AIM< is on a mission to destroy a rogue AI threatening to destroy the first human off-world colony. AIM< arrives at what remains of the ransacked colony and quickly discovers that the AI was prepared for the mech's arrival.

Gameplay

Experience action puzzle platforming gameplay as the futuristic mech, AIM<. Balance the versatile arsenal of drones and ammo to solve puzzles, outwit malicious technology, and survive the dangerous environment.

Features

AIM< mech

A futuristic mech capable of combat and recycling found materials to make drones and ammo.

Unique puzzle platforming

Besides traditional ground-plane movement, use shooting to navigate the environment, acquire resources, and overcome obstacles.

Choose wisely

Balance the unique capabilities of the mech and drones while managing resources to explore the colony.
